title: Scarface Arrested At BET Hip Hop Awards 2015
text: Scarface Arrested At BET Hip Hop Awards 2015 Saturday, 10 October 2015 (12 minutes ago) What was supposed to a nice night (Oct. 9). at the 2015 BET Hip Hop Awards for Scarface ended with a major hitch. The Houston rap legend was arrested shortly after receiving the “I Am Legend Award.” According to Freddy-O, after accepting his award from Ludacris, the cops were waiting for Face Mob as he […] The post Scarface Arrested At BET Hip Hop Awards 2015 appeared first on Hip-Hop Wired. Scarface was a man of few words after accepting his "I Am Hip Hop" award, directing the attention away from himself and toward the many that have... Billboard.com 3 hours ago - Entertainment Scarface, known for his gritty street wise narratives, received the "I Am Hip Hop" award at the 10th annual BET Hip-Hop Awards in Atlanta. MyNorthwest.com 15 hours ago - Entertainment Atlanta is undoubtedly the international travel hub of the South and this weekend it will undoubtedly act as the world’s hip-hop hub.
